title: Naval Troops arrest 04 Persons with 15 kilograms of Cannabis and a Shot Gun
content: Naval troops attached to SLNS Thambapanni of the North Western Naval Command arrested 04 persons with 15 kilograms of cannabis and a shot gun (Made in Sri Lanka) at the Nugawala Junction in Puttalam on 05th April 2014. The suspects and the arrested items will be handed over to Kobeigane Police for legal action….
